body.p: The Board issued the amendments resulting from the 2010 ED together with amendments relating to termination benefits resulting from the exposure draft Proposed Amendments to IAS 37 Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets and IAS 19 Employee Benefits (the 2005 ED), published in June 2005. The Board concluded that it would be better to issue both sets of amendments together rather than delay the completion of the amendments for termination benefits until it completed its work on IAS 37 Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets.
